structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
A FINANCE AND REVENUE OF CITIES

law.text: A city may not finance any improvement through special assessments except pursuant to KRS 91A.200 to 91A.290, or other statutory authority.
law.history: Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 234, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1980.
